Now<WG1161> these things<WG5023> were<WG1096> our<WG2257> examples,<WG5179> to the intent<WG1519> we<WG2248> should<WG1511> not<WG3361> lust after<WG1938> evil things,<WG2556> as<WG2531> they also<WG2548> lusted.<WG1937>

Neither<WG3366> be<WG1096> idolaters,<WG1496> as<WG2531> some<WG5100> of them<WG846> were.<WG5613> As it is written,<WG1125> "The people<WG2992> sat down<WG2523> to eat<WG5315> and<WG2532> drink,<WG4095> and<WG2532> rose up<WG450> to play.<WG3815>"

Neither<WG3366> let us commit sexual immorality,<WG4203> as<WG2531> some<WG5100> of them<WG846> committed,<WG4203> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> one<WG1520> day<WG2250> twenty<WG1501> - three<WG5140> thousand<WG5505> fell.<WG4098>
Neither<WG3366> let us test<WG1598> the Lord,<WG5547> as<WG2531> some<WG5100> of<WG5259> them<WG846> <WG2532> tested,<WG3985> and<WG2532> perished<WG622> by the serpents.<WG3789>
Neither<WG3366> grumble,<WG1111> as<WG2531> some<WG5100> of them<WG846> also<WG2532> grumbled,<WG1111> and<WG2532> perished<WG622> by<WG5259> the destroyer.<WG3644>

Now<WG1161> all<WG3956> these things<WG5023> happened<WG4819> to them<WG1565> by way of example,<WG5179> and<WG1161> they were written<WG1125> for<WG4314> our<WG2257> admonition,<WG3559> on<WG1519> whom<WG3739> the ends<WG5056> of the ages<WG165> have come.<WG2658>
Therefore<WG5620> let him who thinks<WG1380> he stands<WG2476> be careful<WG991> that he doesn't<WG3361> fall.<WG4098>

No<WG3756> temptation<WG3986> has<WG2983> taken<WG2983> you<WG5209> except what<WG1487> is<WG3361> common to man.<WG442> God<WG2316> is<WG3361> faithful,<WG4103> who<WG3739> will<WG1439> not<WG3756> allow<WG1439> you<WG5209> to be tempted<WG3985> above<WG5228> what<WG3739> you are able,<WG1410> but<WG235> will<WG4160> with<WG4862> the temptation<WG3986> also<WG2532> make<WG4160> the way of escape,<WG1545> that you<WG5209> may be able<WG1410> to endure it.<WG5297>
Therefore,<WG1355> my<WG3450> beloved,<WG27> flee<WG5343> from<WG575> idolatry.<WG1495>
I speak<WG3004> as<WG5613> to wise men.<WG5429> Judge<WG2919> <WG5210> what<WG3739> I say.<WG5346>

The cup<WG4221> of blessing<WG2129> which<WG3739> we bless,<WG2127> isn't<WG3780> it<WG2076> a sharing<WG2842> of the blood<WG129> of Christ?<WG5547> The bread<WG740> which<WG3739> we break,<WG2806> isn't<WG3780> it<WG2076> a sharing<WG2842> of the body<WG4983> of Christ?<WG5547>

Because<WG3754> there is one<WG1520> loaf of bread,<WG740> we,<WG2070> who are many,<WG4183> are<WG3348> one<WG1520> body;<WG4983> for<WG1063> we all<WG3956> partake<WG3348> of<WG1537> the one<WG1520> loaf of<WG1537> bread.<WG740>
Consider<WG991> Israel<WG2474> according<WG2596> to the flesh.<WG4561> <WG1526> Don't<WG3780> those<WG3588> who eat<WG2068> the sacrifices<WG2378> participate<WG2844> in the altar?<WG2379>
What<WG5101> am I<WG5346> saying then?<WG3767> That<WG3754> a thing<WG5100> sacrificed to idols<WG1497> is<WG2076> anything,<WG5100> or<WG2228> <WG3754> that an idol is<WG2076> anything?<WG5100>

But<WG235> I say that<WG3754> the things<WG3588> which<WG3739> the Gentiles<WG1484> sacrifice,<WG2380> they sacrifice<WG2380> to demons,<WG1140> and<WG2532> not<WG3756> to God,<WG2316> and<WG1161> I don't<WG3756> desire<WG2309> that<WG1096> you<WG5209> would have<WG1096> fellowship<WG2844> with demons.<WG1140>

You<WG3756> can't<WG1410> both drink<WG4095> the cup<WG4221> of the Lord<WG2962> and<WG2532> the cup<WG4221> of demons.<WG1140> You<WG3756> can't<WG1410> both partake<WG3348> of the table<WG5132> of the Lord,<WG2962> and<WG2532> of the table<WG5132> of demons.<WG1140>
Or do we<WG2070> provoke<WG3863> the Lord<WG2962> to jealousy?<WG3863> Are we<WG2070> stronger<WG2478> than he?<WG846>

"All things<WG3956> are lawful<WG1832> for me,<WG3427>" but<WG235> not<WG3756> all things<WG3956> are<WG4851> profitable.<WG4851> "All things<WG3956> are lawful<WG1832> for me,<WG3427>" but<WG235> not<WG3756> all things<WG3956> build up.<WG3618>
Let no one<WG3367> seek<WG2212> his own,<WG1438> but<WG235> each one<WG1538> his neighbor<WG2087>'s good.
Whatever<WG3956> is sold<WG4453> in<WG1722> the butcher shop,<WG3111> eat,<WG2068> asking<WG350> no<WG3367> question<WG350> for<WG1223> the sake of conscience,<WG4893>
for<WG1063> "the earth<WG1093> is the Lord<WG2962>'s, and<WG2532> its<WG846> fullness.<WG4138>"

But if<WG1487> one<WG5100> of those<WG3588> who don't<WG571> believe invites<WG2564> you<WG5209> to a meal,<WG2532> and you are inclined<WG2309> to go,<WG4198> eat<WG2068> whatever<WG3956> is set before<WG3908> you,<WG5213> asking<WG350> no<WG3367> questions<WG350> for<WG1223> the sake of conscience.<WG4893>

But<WG1161> if<WG1437> anyone<WG5100> says<WG2036> to you,<WG5213> "This<WG5124> was<WG2076> offered to idols,<WG1494>" don't<WG3361> eat<WG2068> it for<WG1223> the sake of the one who<WG1565> told<WG3377> you,<WG2532> and for<WG1063> the sake<WG4893> of conscience.<WG1063> For "the earth<WG1093> is the Lord<WG2962>'s, and<WG2532> all its fullness.<WG4138>"

Conscience,<WG4893> I say,<WG3004> not<WG3780> your own,<WG1438> but<WG235> the other<WG2087>'s conscience.<WG1063> For <WG2443> why<WG2444> is my<WG3450> liberty<WG1657> judged<WG2919> by<WG5259> another<WG243> conscience?<WG4893>
<WG1161> If<WG1487> I<WG1473> partake<WG3348> with thankfulness,<WG5485> why<WG5101> am I denounced<WG987> for<WG5228> that for which<WG3739> I<WG1473> give thanks?<WG2168>
Whether<WG1535> therefore<WG3767> you eat,<WG2068> or<WG1535> drink,<WG4095> or<WG1535> whatever<WG5100> you do,<WG4160> do<WG4160> all<WG3956> to<WG1519> the glory<WG1391> of God.<WG2316>
Give<WG1096> no occasions for stumbling,<WG677> either<WG2532> to Jews,<WG2453> or<WG2532> to Greeks,<WG1672> or<WG2532> to the assembly<WG1577> of God;<WG2316>

even as<WG2531> I<WG2504> also please<WG700> all<WG3956> men in all<WG3956> things,<WG3361> not seeking<WG2212> my own<WG1683> profit,<WG4851> but<WG235> the<WG3588> profit of the many,<WG4183> that<WG2443> they may be saved.<WG4982>
